Earlier today I spoke with @ProtectOurCare about why the Affordable Care Act is so important during this pandemic.

If Republicans & Trump have their way, millions could lose their health care in the middle of a global health crisis. The stakes could not be higher—we must fight.

I believe all Americans should be eligible for these payments & know that too many people have been excluded. I've been fighting for more people to have access to these payments, including Supplemental Security Income (SSI) beneficiaries & families experiencing homelessness.
